name: Futuristic Battlegrounds PvP
description:
Fight, Kill, Survive & Be The Last Man Standing On The Epic Battlegrounds!

Tired of all the desert battle or grand battle games? Do you crave an adrenaline-fueled experience that gets you all pumped up? Then wait no more as Futuristic Battlegrounds PvP is just the multiplayer survival arena game where you will use all your wits to kill & learn survival rules to be the lone survivor on futuristic battlegrounds.


Get ready for an ultimate battle strategy game as you step in to the futuristic survival arena. Be the lone survivor, the victorious last man standing on the futuristic battlegrounds in the galactic space. Explore the vast battleground along with the player unknown in this best survival strategy game, get equipped for the PvP battle royale experience, forge an unmatchable battle arena strategy and manifest your own survival rules on the lands of galactic space.


Join thousands of players in a galactic invasion era, and try to outlive & outwit other player unknown on the battle survival grounds. All players start bare handed, and have to collect weapons by exploring the vast lands of mars, Jupiter etc. all you rely is on your wits and reflexes!


This futuristic galactic battle arena game of the unknown battlegrounds is definitely the ultimate battle royale game that you have been looking for. Get hooked to this call of survival rules game and live the war zone fantasy in the grand battle arena of outer space. Only survival rules to remember is to survive the harsh conditions of the vast battlegrounds. Challenge your friends or foes in this futuristic battle arena game, play with your survival squad and jump into fierce galactical grand battles. In this multiplayer battle game your ultimate aim is to be the last man standing.
